reviews.review: The game is awesome, I CRI EVERTIM I FINISH THE GAME.... 11/10
我们等了十一年了，什么时候才能给岳父报仇啊……

Cada momento en el que salia su maravilloso soundtrack y empezaban los tiros, mi piel se ponia de gallina.
Se me hizo unico esos momentos en los que me enfrentaba a los raptores y a la Alianza, sin duda, con un final bastante chocante que me dejo con ganas de más.
Sus escenas de acción son sorprendentes con unos ambientes hermosos, donde nos metemos al bosque y observamos las ruinas de la Ciudad 17 despues de lo que hicimos en Half Life 2 y el EP1.
Voy a seguir esperando a tu tercer episodio.
(Gaben, esta mierda de episodios no esta bien, son cortos joputa)
Y basta con lo fanboy, no todo son rositas. Este juego me tomo 5 horas pasarmelo mientras que el Half Life 2 alrededor de unas 9-10 y las cosas que traian de nuevo no eran muchas, mas alla de un nuevo vehiculo, un instrumento para acabar con los zancudos y... Nada mas... Ademas que en algunos puzzles no te explican muy bien, como la parte del puente, si bien nos dan la "pista" de tirar los autos cuando nos subimos y se cael a parte derecha, eso no da suficiente explicacion como para saber que hacer, estuve 10 minutos dando vueltas hasta que se me dio por tirar los autos.
Amo esta saga, y a veces sus bugs, se le perdonan, gracias por poco Gabe.

Half-Life 2:Episode 2 is the 4th main instalment in Valve's Iconic sci-fi FPS series;Half Life. THe visuals are improved from the previous games, gameplay is still loyal to the series, and using the aging source engine, there is almost no doubt you can run this game on any computer you can find. Achievements are quite frustrating  especially the "Little Rocket Man", "Neighbourhood Watch", and "Get Some Grub" which are a pain to do and most likely require a guide/youtube video. If you are an achievement hunter that is (I got all achievements, and trust me, it's painful to do). Story left of after the events of Half-Life 2:Episode 1, we play as Gordon Freeman; our silent protaganist in the series to [spoiler] get to white forest	[/spoiler]


The only thing bad about this game is this is the last game of the series, it leaves on a cliffhanger with no concluding sequel, it leaves off with the player questioning what will happen next, will the resistance crumble or will they free humanity from the combine. Will Gordon Freeman [spoiler] follow Eli's advice and destroy the Borealis or listen to Kleiner and use it against the combine, what will happen to Mossman.	[/spoiler]  We will never know the epic conclusion to the half life series all because valve cannot count to three. whether it be "Half-Life 2:Episode 3" or "Half-Life 3". we your playerbase do not care about this hearthstone ripoff "Artifact", nor will the combined demand for more Dota 2, CS:GO, TF2 updates match up to our hunger for the epic conclusion [b] OF THE HALF-LIFE SERIES!!!!!!!!!!!!!!![/b]

ep 3 am I right fellas










Oh boy, it'll never happen
Uma historia emocionante, uma jogabilidade e mecânicas que diferenciam de qualquer jogo de sua época, ema ótima experiencia...

Just as Half Life 2 itself, the episodes are a blast to play. I would even argue that they have some of the best levels in the game. The only bad thing I have to mention is the end, which wouldn't be a problem if there were an episode 3 or even a Half Life 3, which, as of the day I write the review, isn't the case.  So the ending is just an immense cliffhanger for a successor-game that never was produced. But I still hope that one day, Valve will present an awesome part 3.

10 Sene önce oynadığım oyunu geçen hafta tekrardan bitirmeye karar verdim. Bu sefer oyunu düşük bir sistemle oynamadım,  Ultra grafikler de 144hz monitorumle oynadım ve Source moturunun ne kadar iyi olduğunu farkettim. Oyunun yeni serisini 10 yıldır bekliyorum ve hala da beklemeye devam ediyorum. Bir oyuncuya yapılacak en kötü şey; sevdiği oyunun yapımını durdurulmasıdır.  Oyunun hikayesi sürükleyici ve güzel, fakat 10 senedir hala meraktayım "acaba ne oldu?" diye.  Sizlerden "Valve'den" tek isteğim en azından bir son yapın. En azından oyun yarım kalmasın. 

Gaben Newell, Oyunculara bunu yapmamalısınız.
Kolejny komplet epizod, kolejne świetne przeżycie. Może dużych zmian w rozgrywce nie było, jednak fabuła jak zawsze trzyma poziom. Niesmak jednak pozostał. Gaben, czekamy.

HL2 Episode 2 continues what the critically acclaimed Half Life 2 anime series was doing. Providing a strong zero-cutscene narrative interspersed with the coolest setpieces in FPS anime history. And Episode 2 delivers. While EPisode 1 introduces new mechanisms to our characters, E2 puts them in much more open areas for better action. And this action keeps on increasing until the final strider battle( which imo is amazing) and then ends on a cliffhanger.

No podes dejarme sin Half Life 3 con ese final. Por lo demas buen juego. El mejor de los 2 episodios y algo mas largo que el episodio 1. Me hubiese gustado eso si que pusieran armas nuevas, pero al menos hay enemigos nuevos. No se siente mas de los mismo como el episodio 1. Obviamente recomendado pese al final inconcluso que tiene (aunque a dia de hoy podes encontrar la conclusion escrita por internet).
This was the best Half-Life game I ever played. I think its even better than HL2 and HL1, but It was short, thats the problem.

Que se puede decir que no se haya dicho ya de la saga Half Life. Exelente de principio a fin, la mejor saga de ciencia ficcion que he jugado, un clasico de todos los tiempos que, aunque inconcluso, vale mucho la pena jugarla por completo. Los pesonajes son geniales, los enemigos son geniales, las armas son geniales y los puzzles son geniales. Todo se junta en un mundo de ciencia ficcion imprecionante.

Aun que haya partes que pueden parecer tediosas, es bien merecida la fama que tiene.

10/10 a toda la saga.

Another excellent Half-Life game. In terms of quality, it is comparable to Episode One, with a different setting. This one is tunnels and open rural terrain, whereas E1 was mostly set in the Citidel tower and urban areas. Running through the tunnels was a bit dull, but the outside terrain levels were a lot of fun.

The graphics and technologies are still amazing. During the cut-scenes, I just look at the way light and shadows work on the faces of the characters, as I rotate around them. Such detail is usually lost in the action, but the physics, models, and use of light refraction is just amazing and realistic.

The HL2 games are frequently discounted, here on steam, so make sure you play through this game series, to enjoy some of the best story-driven first-person shooters, anywhere.

Stay tuned for the upcoming final release of Black Mesa, a fan-made source game, that will continue the story of Gordon Freeman, from the first Half-Life game. Sadly, this game ends Valve's development of Gordon-Mia storyline.

ilk oyun ve episode 1i bitirir bitirmez buna da başladım 3 gun içinde toplam 35 40 saat oynayarak bitirdim oyunu. Bu oyunda hikaye pek ilerlemiyor gibi hissettim daha çok vur oldur parçala gibi sanki . Konuşmalar ayrı bir guzel . Yine Vortigauntlar olmasa allaha emanet gidiyoruz . Kısaca mukkemmeldi. Шикарный второй эпизод. Он продолжительней первого эпизода. Локации стали гораздо обширнее, очень много лесной местности. Добавили новый вид врагов - охотники. Довольно опасные, если у вас нет достаточной сноровки. Масса запоминающихся моментов. Например, спуск в шахту Победы и битва со страйдерами почти в самом конце. Ну и само собой, запуск ракеты. Впечатляющее зрелище. Жаль, что продолжения так и нет. Концовку решили оставить открытой...
